short_description: An AI-Native Browser
long_description:
Meet Meteor: a Chrome-alternative that can actually do your work for you.

With agents getting better by the day (literally), we realize that it‚Äôs time to automate the boring, tedious work.

We use your browser session to empower agents to act like your personal assistants (ex. book a calendar, find cheaper flights, buy clothes on amazon etc.)

Some of Meteor‚Äôs features:

- Chat with any page
- Integrate with popular apps like Gmail, Google Calendar, Twitter etc.
- Browser agent to autonomously navigate the web and perform tasks
- More coming soon!

We're excited to usher in a new era of browsing.

short_description: A developer-friendly and enterprise-grade search API.
long_description:
Our mission is to make every search interaction meaningful & rewarding, through developer-friendly and enterprise-grade APIs.

Algolia is the leading Search & Discovery API for websites and mobile apps. We help the most innovative companies across e-commerce, media and SaaS industries create powerful, relevant and scalable discovery experiences for their users. Unlike other solutions, our hosted platform reduces the complexities of building and scaling a fast, relevant digital experience and helps teams accelerate development time. More than 9,000 companies like Under Armour, Twitch, Periscope, Medium and Stripe rely on Algolia to manage 50+ billion search queries a month.

Founded in 2012, we're backed by $184M in funding from Accel Partners, Alven Capital, Point Nine Capital and Storm Ventures. The team is headquartered in San Francisco with offices in Paris, London, New York, and Atlanta. To learn more, visit www.algolia.com.

---
We‚Äôre looking for talented, passionate people to build the world‚Äôs best search technology. As an ownership-driven company, we seek team members who thrive under autonomy and diversity. 

We're committed to building an inclusive and diverse workplace. We care about each other and the world around us, and embrace talented people regardless of their race, age, ancestry, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, color, veteran status, disability and socioeconomic background

short_description: Gemnote is the easiest way to design, create and send custom products.
long_description: Gemnote creates custom merch, swag and gifts for the modern business. Our expert team helps you curate, source, warehouse, fulfill and ship your branded merchandise and company swag, so you don't have to lift a finger. Our clients love our full-service platform and they are some of the biggest companies in the world, including Airbnb, Google, Meta, Slack, Netflix and more.

short_description: AI Agent for Clinic EMRs
long_description: Perspectives listens in on clinical sessions and completes admin for clinicians inside their EMR. Clinicians using Perspectives get half their time back, can see more clients, and can connect better with patients.

short_description: AI-Native BPO for travel & transport
long_description:
Humoniq is building the first AI-Native BPO for the travel & transport industries, which outsource $20B of customer support each year. Our AI-native approach improves speed, accuracy, and satisfaction.

Our team is uniquely equipped to solve this challenge. We previously grew a travel management company, Flightfox (YC S12), to $22M/yr. We handled thousands of customer requests each month, which exposed the limitations of traditional outsourcing.

open_jobs.title: Senior AI Engineer
open_jobs.description:
We are hiring a Senior AI Engineer to own our AI‚Äôs ability to understand, respond to, and act on user queries from the ground up. This is not a research role or a ‚Äúprompt tinkering‚Äù side project. You will build agentic LLM systems that can connect to external tools and APIs, structure their reasoning, and execute actions reliably.
You‚Äôll be hands-on with prompt engineering, LLM frameworks, and agent design, while also applying software engineering rigor to make these systems stable, scalable, and useful. The right candidate moves fast, learns new methods as the field shifts, and always drives toward business outcomes, not demos or academic novelty.
We don‚Äôt believe in overwork or equating hours with outcomes. What matters is results tied to business and customer outcomes‚Äînothing else.
This is a hybrid role, 3‚Äì4 days per week in-office in Mission Viejo.
What You‚Äôll Do
Design and implement LLM-powered agents that can reason, decide, and act via connected APIs, databases, and external systems.
Own the prompting, fine-tuning, and orchestration that make these systems intelligent and usable.
Apply strong engineering principles (modularity, testing, observability) so the AI‚Äôs actions are reliable in production.
Continuously scan the landscape for new frameworks, libraries, and techniques, and integrate what‚Äôs useful.
Collaborate with product and leadership to ensure progress is tied directly to business results.
Document decisions and trade-offs, ensuring clarity for current and future teammates.
Proven ability to deliver usable systems under startup constraints: full ownership of outcomes, small teams, fast pivots, and delivering usable systems with limited resources.
Work in a modified agile framework based on your direct input (no dogma or purist approach) with daily standups and project management coordinated between you, the COO, and two other engineers (frontend and backend).
Take strategic and product guidance from a cofounder who will be in-office with you in Orange County. The COO supports your growth and ensures you have what you need to succeed, while the cofounders focus on product excellence
You'll occasionally join customer calls to hear feedback and problems directly from users.
Must-Haves
Strong, validated expertise in software engineering with expertise shipping production systems from beginning to end.
Deep hands-on work with LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, open-source stacks, LangChain/LlamaIndex/transformers, etc.) and expertise in building agents using them.
Experience building multi-step, tool-using agents that act across varied systems, not just single-action chatbots
Proven ability to pick up new technologies quickly and apply them pragmatically.
Ability to turn messy, ambiguous problems into solvable projects, with clear scoping, regular updates, and visible progress for stakeholders
Excellent communication: clearly defines projects, can explain assumptions, trade-offs, and progress clearly.
What We Value
We hire for mental models, not buzzwords. The right candidate will embody:
Bias to Progress
‚Üí Keeps work moving, persistent in ambiguity, avoids getting stuck.
Business Results First
‚Üí Prioritizes impact over complexity, identity, or ‚Äúcool tech.‚Äù
Simplicity Bias
‚Üí Builds the leanest path to the outcome, avoids overbuilding.
Ownership
‚Üí Takes responsibility, integrates feedback, doesn‚Äôt deflect blame.
Adaptability
‚Üí Learns new tools fast, evolves methods as the field shifts.
Collaborative Pragmatism
‚Üí Can disagree respectfully, align quickly, and execute.
Nice-to-Haves
Experience with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) or vector DBs.
Exposure to evaluation frameworks for LLMs to ensure reliability scoring and reduce hallucinations.
Experience in startups or lean environments where speed and iteration matter.
Compensation and Growth
$150,000 + Equity
Health, Dental and Vision Insurance + Dependents
Four Weeks Paid Time Off (We try to encourage you to take time off)
Interview Process
At Humoniq, we design hiring to be fair, predictive, and respectful of your time. You‚Äôll have the chance to show what you can do on your own terms, choosing when and where, so you‚Äôre able to perform at your best.
The data is clear:
resumes are one of the weakest predictors of job performance
(Hunter & Schmidt‚Äôs meta-analysis, ~0.1‚Äì0.2 correlation). They‚Äôre noisy, biased toward pedigree, and reward formatting skills.
That‚Äôs why we combine structured interviews with research-backed assessments.
Fairness:
Interviews can sometimes reward confidence over skill. Assessments give every candidate the same chance to show their abilities, leveling the playing field.
Effectiveness:
Decades of studies show assessments are stronger predictors of job success than interviews alone. They help us focus on real skills, not just first impressions.
For You:
This means you won‚Äôt be judged on resume, background, accent, or personality quirks, but on what really matters is your ability to do the work.
Our entire process will take less than 8 hours, and will not require any ‚Äòat home‚Äô assessment from you. There will be an in person component as part of the last interview.

short_description: Rippling for Content Creators
long_description:
The rapidly growing creator economy ($250B+) consists of millions of solo entrepreneurs still managing complex business finances with spreadsheets and a patchwork of disconnected tools. They face volatile multi-source income, unique business expenses, and daunting U.S. tax obligations: leading to significant stress, lost time, and missed financial opportunities.

Beluga Labs is building the financial operating system for these modern solopreneurs. Our platform starts with intelligent bookkeeping: we connect all their financial accounts, use AI to automatically categorize income and expenses, and assess their potential tax deductibility, giving creators a clear picture of their business finances and tax preparedness. This core solution, already actively used for expense management and tax Q&A, is the first step. We will rapidly expand to automate quarterly tax filing and payments, then provide integrated tools for S-corp formation and management, payroll, and benefits: truly becoming the 'Rippling for content creators.' Our success means creators save more money, reduce administrative burdens, and can confidently focus on their craft and growth within the creator economy.

short_description: Terra is like Faire for custom goods
long_description: Enter Terra, a new world of product building. Connect with suppliers, expedite sampling, and track production in real-time, removing the uncertainties of overseas manufacturing.

short_description: Powers OTT online video providers with video developer tools.
long_description:
Bitmovin has been a first mover in almost every significant development in online video, from building and deploying the world‚Äôs first (and fastest) commercial adaptive streaming (MPEG-DASH/HLS) HTML5 Player, to being the first to achieve 100x realtime encoding speeds in the cloud. Bitmovin provides HEVC as well as VP9 live streaming with 60FPS and 4K resolution, and built the first containerized video encoding solution with Docker and Kubernetes.

Bitmovin products are completely in-house developed, easy and fast to integrate and highly customizable. In combination with our great support, documentation and SLAs, this is a true enterprise offering.

To find out more about Bitmovin‚Äôs video infrastructure solutions, or about any individual products, contact sales@bitmovin.com, or visit our website: bitmovin.com

open_jobs.title: Sales Director
open_jobs.description:
Use this link to apply directly:
https://grnh.se/99d740c42
Bitmovin provides API based Software that helps developers around the world to solve the most complex video problems with a video player library that plays everywhere. Come join the team building innovative online video software for developers and content owners worldwide!
We‚Äôre looking for talented, passionate and inspired people who believe in the possibilities of video to tell compelling stories and want to enable video creation as well as consumption. Join us to innovate and lead the market for video encoding, playback on mobile and other devices, and analytics around user experiences.
Bitmovin is looking for a motivated sales executive with a background in B2B/B2D technology and/or SaaS with a strong track record of overachievement. As the Sales Director at Bitmovin, you will build relationships and close business with existing as well as new enterprise customers. The successful candidate is a results-oriented and self-motivated individual with an outgoing personality and comfortable with both technical and business concepts. In addition, we are searching for an energetic and organized self-starter who understands sales processes and can build relationships with the right decision-makers. You will be a key driver of revenue growth for the company and on the front lines for evangelizing our product to prospective users.
In this position, you will be working closely with the Sales and Business Development team to develop targeted strategies and messaging in order to drive opportunities for new business and get new leads. Outstanding communication skills are required, a willingness to go above and beyond both for Bitmovin as well as our customers.
As a Sales Director you will
Identify high-potential prospective customers and grow new revenue from businesses of all sizes
Build and maintain relationships with executives, operational teams and developers
Present the value of our solutions to the customers‚Äô individual needs
Manage the full sales cycle from prospecting to close
Manage legal/procurement process to create scalable global agreements
Work with internal departments to coordinate resources to make accounts successful
Travel occasionally for conferences and customer meetings
It would be great if you have
5+ years of B2B/B2D and/or SaaS sales experience in a revenue closing sales executive role
Experience of selling streaming media solutions and/or video infrastructure to the major broadcasters
Ability to understand the Bitmovin Platform and not only build great relationships with Technical and Business buyers, but transform the platform into Business Value for the customers
Results driven while able to try new processes and iterate to scale a global sales engine - including lead generation, presentation, negotiation, and more
Strong analytical, critical thinking and problem solving skills.
Exceptional communication skills ‚Äì written and verbal
Passion for technology and aptitude to learn new technologies
Knowledge of technologies and applications such as Salesforce, Github, etc
Bachelor‚Äôs degree
Bitmovin‚Äôs Benefits
Working with an innovative, fast-growing and international team with low hierarchy
Opportunity to make an impact on the multimedia industry, with target markets EU, US and APAC
Competitive salary
Flexible work hours
Investment in growth and education
No routines, but new challenging projects with global impact
Regular and fun team activities (hackathons, skiing days, ‚Ä¶)
Choose your own hardware
The opportunity to work for an exciting start-up, building innovative video solutions
401k plan (US only)
About Bitmovin
Bitmovin, a YCombinator company,  is a fast growing privately owned technology leader, located in San Francisco, CA and Klagenfurt, Austria.
The company was founded by the co-creators of international media standards like MPEG-DASH, that is used today by Netflix, Youtube, and others. Bitmovin is the technology leader in online video technologies such as cloud-based encoding, adaptive streaming players, 360¬∞/VR streaming and performance analytics. Bitmovin is backed by top investors such as Atomico as well as industry leaders like the former VP Engineering of Netflix, former CTO of Cisco, founder of Unity3D, and many others. Bitmovin‚Äôs customers include the top media and technology companies worldwide, including Ooyala, RTL, Pro7Sat1, Bouygues Telecom, Cloudflare, Technicolor, Televisa, Zattoo and many others.
Working at Bitmovin is fast-paced, fun and challenging with colleagues and customers worldwide.
Bitmovin is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
STARTING TIME: Immediately
Empower your future and join us now!
Bitmovin does not accept unsolicited referrals or resumes from any source other than directly from candidates. The submission of referrals or resumes by anyone other than a candidate directly to Bitmovin will be deemed gratuitous, and the company will not be obligated or bound in any way to pay any fee if the candidate is hired.

short_description: USDC-Smart Neobank for Latinos.
long_description:
We‚Äôre building Kontigo, a USDC Smart Neobank for Latinos in the U.S. and Latin America.

We launched our Peer-to-Peer onramp 20 days ago and we‚Äôve already had $540k in deposits, 10k active users and a +300k waitlist. 

The founding team has built and scaled fintechs in Latam, and it‚Äôs ex-Venmo, Nubank, Rappi, MercadoLibre, Ual√°, Platzi, and Yuno. 

We‚Äôre already backed by DST Global, Soma Capital, Pioneer Fund, Transpose + 10 YC alums.

Sending money to Latin America is just as painful as holding it due to the region's fragmentation into 33 countries with 39 different currencies. 

On one hand, cross-border payments to Latam are absurdly expensive (up to 20% per transaction). Conversely, over the past decade, currency depreciation across the region has become unsustainable. (some countries surpassing the trillion percent ). 

Kontigo solves this with a USDC global wallet & a BTC savings account. 

- Like Venmo, but on-USDC.
- Like Zelle, but for cross-border payments. No limits.
- Like Nubank & Revolut, but without inflationary currencies. Bitcoin-backed.

User wallets are connected to an AI-private banker on WhatsApp to execute international USDC transactions.

open_jobs.title: Founding Engineer
open_jobs.description:
"Men wanted for hazardous journey. Low wages, bitter cold, long hours of complete darkness. Safe return doubtful. Honour and recognition in event of success"
You gotta be in founder mode.
Next.js web / React Native app. / Supabase, firebase, and Prisma. / Nest.js for WhatsApp / Open AI and Anthropic APIs for agents / Solidity and web3.js for Smart contracts. / A lot of Typescript.

short_description: Custom Parts, Manufactured in America üá∫üá∏
long_description:
Vendra Marketplace makes sourcing custom parts from US manufacturers effortless. Submit one RFQ and Vendra automates the entire sourcing process - matching you with the right suppliers, handling outreach, and collecting competitive quotes. Full transparency and no middleman markups - just smarter sourcing. 

Visit www.vendra-marketplace.io and submit an RFQ today!

open_jobs.title: Supplier Operations Lead
open_jobs.description:
About the founders üë®‚Äçüîßüë®‚Äçüíª
Anish (CTO) built machine learning algorithms for one of the largest satellite datasets in the world at General Atomics, and was founding machine learning engineer at Ship Angel.
Shan (CEO) worked on next-gen hardware at Microsoft (HoloLens 2), Apple (Vision Pro), and designed most of the cameras on Skydio‚Äôs latest generation X10 drone, spending months working onsite with manufacturers across the US and Asia.
About the Role üë®‚ÄçüöÄ
As Supplier Operations Lead, you‚Äôll be the right hand to the CEO on all things supply in Vendra‚Äôs two-sided marketplace. You‚Äôll own the workflows, processes, and relationships that power our manufacturing network, and help define the internal tools and product roadmap to scale it fast. This role is for someone with hands on experience in hardware and loves working directly with manufacturers and technical teams to solve real, physical problems.
What you‚Äôll do
Manage and support active supplier relationships to ensure reliable manufacturing, quality, and delivery across active customers and orders
Act as a feedback loop between suppliers and engineering to prioritize product features that streamline operations for both sides of the marketplace
Define and track key metrics like supplier lead time, rejection rates, and responsiveness, and build reporting systems to monitor and improve performance
Work directly with the technical team to ensure capacity planning and load balancing across Vendra‚Äôs supplier network, making sure supplier utilization is optimized
Continuously scout and qualify new suppliers, especially in specialized or high-priority geographies or capabilities (ex: ITAR, aerospace, medtech, etc.)
Work directly with customers and users to collect feedback and help define requirements on the product and supplier side of the marketplace
What we‚Äôre looking for (and what makes you a strong fit)
You have a deep understanding of manufacturing processes and workflows (from quoting to DFM to production to inspections)
You have hands on experience with hardware manufacturing programs, either as a technical contributor (mechanical/electrical engineer) or as part of a supply chain or manufacturing ops team
You‚Äôre comfortable working directly with machine shops and contract manufacturers, including on-site visits, audits, and production troubleshooting
You‚Äôre comfortable as definition of this role changes, as you might be required to hop in and contribute to a sales call with the CEO or join a technical product review with the CTO
You know how software systems are built and can contribute meaningfully to product and feature discussions with engineers
Bonus: Experience as a mechanical or electrical hardware design engineer, especially in high-mix production environments
Super Bonus: Experience with AI tools to build automation and eliminate manual workflows to make your own life or work easier üòâ

short_description: The reliability platform for last-mile delivery
long_description:
Getcho is a local delivery platform for high-value goods. 

We are building a high-reliability delivery network on top of high-volume, unreliable fleets, just like how TCP builds reliable end-to-end networking on top of an unreliable base network (IP).

short_description: Reliable and affordable solar energy in developing countries.
long_description:
SunFarmer provides affordable solar energy for hospitals, schools, businesses, and farms in developing countries.

In many parts of the world, electricity is unavailable, unstable, or extremely expensive. Yet reliable electricity is critical for high quality healthcare, modern education, economic development, and improved agricultural productivity. 

Learn more at sunfarmer.org

short_description: Reasoning models for robotics
long_description:
General Trajectory is building AI for the physical world.

We are training vision-language-action (VLA) models across different embodiments to automate valuable labor starting with palletization, sorting, picking, and packing.

short_description: Direct P2P lending across the international wealth divide.
long_description: Zidisha is the world's first direct peer-to-peer lending service to bridge the international wealth divide, allowing individuals worldwide to lend to and communicate with borrowers in developing countries without local intermediaries.  The direct connection creates better transparency, more profit for the entrepreneurs and lenders, and greater wealth creation for the world's poorest communities.  We've been featured in numerous press and media for our groundbreaking work in using internet and mobile phone technologies to connect entrepreneurs in some of the world's most isolated and impoverished places with the international peer-to-peer lending market.

short_description: AI Copilot for Architects
long_description:
ArchiLabs is building an AI co-pilot for architecture. Instead of spending hours on tedious tasks, architects can 10x their design speed with simple AI prompts.

Brian and William met at Carnegie Mellon as engineers and separately had their own frustrating new construction experiences. Brian ran a tech-enabled homebuilding factory and found the design iteration process to be a massive bottleneck, while William built ground up homes in Texas and had a similar frustration. However, at the time, there wasn't an easy solution to the many pain points in the design process.

As AI reasoning models improve, Brian and William realized that there was a massive opportunity to fix the long-tail of frustrations and build a new construction design experience by fine tuning existing models, becoming bigger than Autodesk, the $60B company in the space.

short_description: The world‚Äôs first AI energy developer
long_description: Astro finds and buys land for new renewable energy projects, secures grid connections at minimal cost, and sells these development-ready projects to larger energy companies. Founded by Alex Fuster, a former Citadel energy trader, Astro's AI models identify profitable grid connections that eliminate the surprise costs causing 80-90% of renewable projects to fail. With the U.S. needing 2,000 gigawatts of new power generation by 2035 for AI data centers and electrification, Astro unlocks development opportunities that traditional methods consistently miss.

short_description: The first platform where parents & kids can co-create AI cartoon shows
long_description:
Pixley is revolutionizing early education. No more passive learning: lectures, worksheets, deskwork. Kids don‚Äôt just watch content ‚Äì they create it. With Pixley, any drawing or picture becomes an animated character, and every episode is shaped by the child‚Äôs imagination.

On the flip side, parents have complete control over what their kids learn. They choose the academic or moral lesson each story teaches, making screen time both safe and educational. For the first time, children and parents have complete control of the media they consume.

We‚Äôre harnessing brand-new video gen technology that‚Äôs set to revolutionize how the world creates and learns. Generating animated, narrative-consistent content from a child‚Äôs input in real time demands breakthroughs in generative AI, safety, and personalization ‚Äì and Pixley has cracked it.

The market opportunity is massive. Families already spend billions on streaming and educational media, but the content is one-size-fits-all. By giving kids a true voice in what they watch, while giving parents control, Pixley makes early education personal, fun, and effective.

We are college dropouts that have been building together for years, winning several hackathons and working with video gen along the way. We built Pixley after we saw the flood of low-quality, algorithmic AI content and knew that kids and parents deserved better.

short_description: Robots for the inspection and maintenance of data centers
long_description:
Boost Robotics is building autonomous mobile manipulation robots to remotely perform manual tasks in data centers. 

The surge in AI applications is pushing data centers to scale faster than they can manage, leading to suboptimal operations and staffing shortages amid rising power and compute demands.

We save data centers millions in insurance premiums and SLA violations by increasing the frequency of inspection and maintenance while reducing the time it takes to triage and address failures.

short_description: Information Security (Cyber Security), Compliance and Privacy (GDPR &‚Ä¶
long_description: We have hundreds of fully qualified and experienced contractors in Information Security, Cloud Security, Privacy and Compliance available at competitive hourly rates.

short_description: Voice AI for booking freight
long_description:
Lanesurf helps freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best prices by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.

Our self-improving voice AI stack is built for the messy reality of logistics - noisy calls, compliance checks, constant exceptions and turns them into faster bookings at better margins.

With each booking, the AI learns from aggregated, anonymized lane and pricing data. As more customers use Lanesurf, this learning compounds, driving faster bookings at the best prices and powering a voice-driven freight marketplace.

short_description: We build Research Engineering Agents
long_description: You share production/eval traces for your AI software and sync your code. Synth asynchronously runs experiments to develop, improve, and maintain your software and hands code/prompts/models off to your team. Designed for teams building vertical AI software/agents.

open_jobs.title: Founding Full Stack Engineer
open_jobs.description:
As a Founding Full Stack Engineer, you‚Äôll create a product interface for the platform and agent that will help engineers and teams improve and maintain their AI software through
specification engineering
. Task-driven UX and monitoring visualization are familiar, but you‚Äôll also need to build software that quickly and effectively communicates the vast amount of information baked into experiments, evaluations, and results.
You‚Äôll have significant influence over product direction and the utmost autonomy.
What you‚Äôll be working on
‚Äî Task management interfaces for the Research Engineer product.
‚Äî Monitoring and specification interfaces to help customers manage and edit their software with Synth
‚Äî Interactive agents
What we‚Äôre looking for
‚Äî Ability to ship consistently and quickly
‚Äî Design sensibilities and ability to work effectively with designers
‚Äî Clear thinking and a desire to create high-performance, functional software
‚Äî Excitement for the prospect of designing new development patterns for AI software
Why join us
‚Äî Live on the frontier of agent post-training, prompt optimization, SFT, RL, and code synthesis alongside a team that has been pushing the field for years
‚Äî Shape how teams and engineers ship and maintain AI software with new patterns like specification-driven development.
‚Äî Operate with full ownership and autonomy; your design and implementation choices set the standard for our user experience

open_jobs.title: Founding Forward Deployed AI/Product Engineer
open_jobs.description:
As a Forward Deployed AI engineer, you‚Äôll work with our most high-value users to ensure their software is properly integrated with the platform, our agent is succeeding at working on their codebase, and identifying important new features and capabilities for research and engineering to develop.
You‚Äôll have significant influence over product direction and the utmost autonomy.
You‚Äôll be working on
Identifying bottlenecks, iterating on the agent product and platform interface, and automating tools for doing so.
Onboarding clients, assisting the agent in integrating client software into the platform, scoping out new tasks on which to train our agent.
What we‚Äôre looking for
Curiosity, intelligence, clear thinking and communication
Strong ability to produce good code fast (half will be ephemeral, the other half handed off to research/eng)
Substantial practical experience using LLMs to generate production software.
Why join us
Live on the frontier of agent post-training, across multiple fronts. Prompt optimization, SFT, RL, and code synthesis. Work with a team who‚Äôs been working on the topic for years.
Help companies across AI verticals deliver software they‚Äôre excited about and solve p0 accuracy and reliability problems for some of the best customers out there
Operate with full ownership and autonomy
About the interview
Initial screener
OSS take home assessment OR OSS code review
45 min coding interview
Onsite

open_jobs.title: Founding AI Engineer
open_jobs.description:
As a AI engineer, you‚Äôll work across our stack to productionize, maintain, and scale our research engineering agent products and experiment software.
You‚Äôll have significant influence over technical direction and full autonomy.
You‚Äôll be working on
Putting battle-tested learning algorithms into production.
Building infrastructure for agent simulation, evaluation, and live code-synthesis.
Owning the user-facing AI layer e.g. our Research Engineer agent, an AI assistant that helps the user review where their software is failing and merge in improved code/prompts/models.
What we‚Äôre looking for
Track record of executing on projects quickly, taking full ownership of outcomes, and making trade-offs
Substantial practical experience using LLMs in products
Curiosity and drive to solve new problems and implement the right product form factor for a novel offering.
Why join us
Live on the frontier of agent post-training, across multiple fronts. Prompt optimization, SFT, RL, and code synthesis. Work with a team who‚Äôs been working on the topic for years.
Help companies across AI verticals deliver software they‚Äôre excited about and solve p0 accuracy and reliability problems for some of the best customers out there
Operate with full ownership and autonomy

short_description: AI for Field Inspection Reports
long_description:
Opusense AI automates field report writing for construction field inspectors. Instead of typing up notes at the end of the day, inspectors can now walk a site, speak observations aloud, snap photos, and let our AI assistant generate a detailed, organized report on-site and in real time.

Combined, the founding team has over 15 years in the construction industry. Writing up these field reports used to take up at least 20% of the week. With Opusense, we cut that time by 5x. Our team combines deep construction experience with technical expertise, Roya has a PhD in civil engineering, and Michael has worked at multiple construction tech startups.

Why hasn‚Äôt this been done before? Construction is slow to adopt new tech, and reporting is messy, photos, voice notes, and field notes all live in silos. Turning that into a clear, structured report requires real insight into how inspectors work and what clients need. Only now, with advances in AI, can we process unstructured data adequately to generate high-quality reports in real time.

The opportunity is massive. Every inspection firm and contractor is struggling with documentation. Manual reports slow them down, create inconsistencies, and delay handoffs. We believe AI can do this better, and Opusense is proving it.

short_description: Credit cards for Indians that banks cannot see
long_description:
RedCarpet issues credit cards to those that banks cannot see. Currently we are one of the largest issuers of credit lines to the new-to-credit customer in India.
In a population base of 800 million people with bank accounts, there are less than 40 million credit cards. 
By building a fullstack SDK for card issuance, underwriting as well as holding capital & collection ops, we are looking to build the Capital One of India.

short_description: Icons and social logos for your website.
long_description:
Add a line of code and get thousands of icons and social logos on your website instantly. Easy to set up, easy to use, and crazy powerful. Let us take care of the icons so you can get back to the important stuff.

Font Awesome. Go make something Awesome.

short_description: Live, AI-powered graph of every possible click path in your software
long_description: SAMMY is an Al that explores your app like a real user, mapping every possible click to generate content, onboard users and spot issues. It updates automatically with every product change, keeping everything running smoothly. It may feel like magic, but it‚Äôs just powerful technology at work.

open_jobs.title: Founding Engineer
open_jobs.description:
Must be currently based in London (sorry we can't take folks moving to london in X months - you need to be based in London today). Unfortunately we cannot support visa sponsorship
JDs are always too long - we prefer to chat in person! However, here are the essentials:
At SAMMY Labs we are building a new software paradigm that will one day [we hope] be as ubiquitous as having a git repo! SAMMY is live, AI-powered graph of every possible click path in our customers software, enabling us to automatically generate personalized onboarding, walkthroughs, and documentation that update instantly - but that's just the start. Check out
www.sammylabs.com
for more info.
Company status:
We've just completed YCombinator and raised a very healthy seed round from T1 investors and Angels.
Top 5 launch in the batch! (
https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/Mqy-sammy-labs-ai-customer-success-agents-your-users-delighted
)
In just 3 months we have 10+ enterprise customers from series A all the way to decacorns!
The role/what we are looking for:
We are all builders and there's a lot to build! We love folks who build in their spare time so show us the cool stuff you have made. Practically, you're a scrappy dev and happy to hop on youtube/deep research to learn new things
Ideally 2+ years experience in a software engineer role (new grads welcome but you need to have things you have personally built). We don't care what university you went to or where you've worked prior, the main thing is you learn fast.
This is a great role for someone who wants to learn the inner-workings of an extremely fast growing startup to one day take the plunge of your own
Skills we favour but aren't a requirement, experience in/with:
Nextjs
Python
AWS infra
Langchain/langgraph
fastapi
Wait so it's a full-stack role? Sort of... If you're purely front-end or backend you need to show you are a beast at one of them - how you show us is up to you
Pay & Equity
Not being transparent with pay & equity sucks, we know. Which is why there is no upper limit to either, come to us with an offer - if you think you're a 150k/yr dev just tell us why, and if we agree - that salary is yours. Same with equity.
Culture & Team
We have overwhelming demand right now, we've had to move new customers to a waitlist... which means we work super hard. If you're past the late nights stage of your career that's totally understandable! We are all laser focused on building an entirely new software paradigm and that should excite you too!
Everyone is autonomous, if you prefer to have a checklist of things to do then perhaps SAMMY isnt for you. You'll be setting your own roadmap.
We're ex-Palantir, ex-founders, ex-hedge fund & ex-team GB athlete (singular, only one us was an athlete, the rest of us were certainly not üôÇ)
Benefits:
We pay whatever you want - it's up to you to convince us you're worth it. That includes equity. We're well-funded and want to take the best folks so the salary should match!
Free lunch & dinner / Josh will cook for you (eat at your own risk)
We do a group activity every week, not something lame like dinner - clay shooting, climbing, VR arcade - that kinda stuff.
Our CEO's dog, Luffy, is unbelievably cute (you must be okay with dogs, he's a non-negotiable!)
